author: markekraus
body:
Closes #5590
Closes #4650 

macOS in Travis CI was always using the system provided libcurl instead of the libcurl+openssl installed through `brew`. This resulted in many false fails and features to "not work". This PR makes `pwsh` use libcurl+openSSL and reenables all of the Web Cmdlets tests that were set to pending.

comments.author: markekraus
comments.body:
PowerShellGet has a line in `Ping-Endpoint` that sets `HttpClientHandler.UseDefaultCredentials` to true. apparently... the libcurl+openssl on macOS doesn't support that feature.

I have no clue about the other fails in the web cmdlets tests... could be bad bad bad coincidence. They passed in my branch earlier. I'll need to do more testing.

But, unless a change is made to PowerShellGet is updated.. this PR can't be merged. 

I'll close this PR and revisit it later.

title: Make macOS use libcurl+OpenSSL in Travis CI
